{{disambig-more|J.R.R. Tolkien|[[J.R.R. Tolkien (disambiguation)]]}} {{book |title=J.R.R. Tolkien: The Shores of Middle-earth | image = J.R.R. Tolkien- The Shores of Middle-earth.jpg |author=[[Robert Giddings]] and Elizabeth Holland |publisher=London: Junction Books |date=December [[1981]] |format=Hardcover and paperback |pages=289 |noisbn={{ISBN|0-86245-018-7}} (hardback)
{{ISBN|0-86245-022-5}} (paperback) |amazon= |amazonprice= }} '''''J.R.R. Tolkien: The Shores of Middle-earth''''' is a 1981 book which investigates the sources of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. ==External links== *[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/booksabouttolkien/shoresofme/description.htm Review on Tolkienlibrary.com] *''[https://fanac.org/fanzines/Niekas/ Is this where Tolkien found his stories?]'', a contemporary review by Jerome Burn. Published in ''The Sunday Times'' on 28 December 1980 and reprinted in [[Niekas 26]]. {{title|italics}} [[Category:Scholarly books]] [[Category:Publications by title]]
